title: Bulgarian national salad (shopska)
intro: I was introduced to this super simple salad recipe when traveling in Eastern Europe. A similar recipe exists in multiple of those countries, and always stars three main ingredients: cucumbers, tomatoes and feta. From there, everything else is optional.

insSteps: Dice the cucumber, feta cheese, tomatoes and bell pepper. Dice the onion in small pieces. Add everything to a big salad bowl.
Drizzle sunflower oil and vinegar over diced vegetables. Season with salt and pepper. Chop parsley and sprinkle on salad. Stir to coat evenly.

notes: Note: It is possible to omit everything except for the cucumber, tomatoes and feta cheese.
